description: Number of diamond polyominoes with n cells.
comments: Also the number of polybricks of size n made of Lego.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Polyrhomb [From _Eric W. Weisstein_, Apr 24 2009]
author: _James A. Sellers_, Aug 28 2000
extensions: More terms from Don Reble (djr(AT)nk.ca), Nov 01 2001
